title.bibl: Svornost, February 12th, 1879. [Factory Taken Over by Bohemians]

div.bibl: SVORNOST, February 12th, 1879. [FACTORY TAKEN OVER BY BOHEMIANS]

body.p: The factory for the manufacture of furniture known under the name of Matuska, Craig and Co. will from now on be a Bohemian enterprise. We are informed that a Bohemian company was organized to take over and manage this factory.
The new company had already been incorporated at Springfield under the name "Matuska Furniture Company, Capital $50,000.00. We wish this new Bohemian enterprise much success.
